stateDiagram

WAIT

WAIT : WAIT

WAIT : enter / #123; CommandSender_WAIT_enter(sm)#59; #125;

WAIT : exit / #123; CommandSender_WAIT_exit(sm)#59; #125;

TICK

TICK : TICK

TICK : enter / #123; CommandSender_TICK_enter(sm)#59; #125;

TICK : exit / #123; CommandSender_TICK_exit(sm)#59; #125;

TICK : do / #123; CommandSender_TICK_do(sm)#59; #125;

%% Initial state name as "." so that it fits in black circle shape.
%% See https://github.com/StateSmith/StateSmith/issues/404
state "." as ROOT.(InitialState)

WAIT --> TICK : TIMEOUT

TICK --> WAIT : do

ROOT.(InitialState) --> WAIT
